input.sentences: it was a beautiful day to play a round of golf .
they remembered to wear hats as protection from the sun .
they were careful to keep score .
output.sentences: It was fancy hat day and Bill was excited to show off his hat.
Bob had a cowboy hat, that was his favorite.
Joe had a fedora, this was the only day he could wear it without being made fun of.
He wore his fedora golfing, his favorite sport.
To end this great fancy hat day Joe ate ice cream with his friends.
